New Records: Willy Adames tied the major league record with his 13th three-run homer of the season
Key Match Events: Adames homered to left (371 feet), Chourio scored and Bauers scored in the 1st inning
Pagés homered to center (415 feet) in the 3rd inning
Hoskins homered to left (384 feet), Mitchell scored in the 4th inning
Pagés homered to left (375 feet) in the 5th inning
Baker hit sacrifice fly to center, Donovan scored in the 6th inning
Chourio homered to left center (420 feet), Hoskins scored, Frelick scored and Ortiz scored in the 6th inning
Miscellaneous Highlights: Willy Adames' 13th three-run homer of the season
Freddy Peralta pitched 5.1 innings, allowing 6 hits, 3 ER, 3 K, 2 BB
Andre Pallante pitched 5.0 innings, allowing 5 hits, 5 ER, 3 K, 5 BB
The game was played at American Family Field in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, with an attendance of 41,731
Others: The Cardinals lost 9-3 to the Brewers, dropping the series 2-1
The Brewers won the game 9-3, improving their record to 81-57
